name: Charizard
description: Charizard flies around the sky in search of powerful opponents.

name: Blastoise
description: Blastoise has water spouts that protrude from its shell.

name: Venusaur
description: There is a large flower on Venusaur's back.

name: Mewtwo
description: Mewtwo is a Pokémon that was created by genetic manipulation.

name: Eevee
description: Eevee has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives.

name: Dragonite
description: Dragonite is capable of circling the globe in just 16 hours.

name: Butterfree
description: Butterfree has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers.

name: Onix
description: Onix has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this Pokémon does not lose direction while it is tunneling.

name: Gengar
description: Gengar is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.
